data.title: About
data.subtitle: A Brief History of ...
data.contents:
Born in Penang, Malaysia. Studied Bachelor of Applied Arts at University Malaysia Sarawak. Post-graduate MSc Digital Futures at Institute of Digital Art and Technology, University of Plymouth, United Kingdom. A minimalist designer and a full-stack web developer who has a thing for science, technology, art and philosophy. A wonderer searching for a theory of everything.

2004 - Present
Works as a Web Developer/Designer, Data Analyst, either as a freelancer, a contractor, a collaborator, or as an employee, for various individuals, companies, organisations and universities across Malaysia and Europe.

1999 - 2002
Worked as a Web Designer and Multimedia Designer/Developer for various local and multinational companies from Penang to Kuala Lumpur in Malaysia. Also worked as a Web Application Developer in Kuala Lumpur from June 2015 to August 2016.

Currently focus in:
PHP, R, JavaScript
Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Koa.js, Express.js, Socket.IO
R Shiny, Plotly, WordPress
GraphGL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, RethinkDB
HTML5, CSS3, LESS, Markdown, Zurb Foundation
jQuery, ES6, ES7, webpack
Apache, Node.js, Shiny Server
PSRs (PHP Standards Recommendations), Standard JS (JavaScript Standard Style)
Linux (Ubuntu/ Kubuntu), Git, PHP Adminer
Pencil Project (prototyping tool)

Experience in:
PHPUnit, Slim Framework, Magento, Shopify
Twitter Bootstrap 3, Twig, Pug
Gulp, Prototype JavaScript, Require.js, Angular, React
Adobe Products: Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Flash, Director, Page Maker
SQLite, phpMyAdmin, MySQL Workbench
JIRA, Confluence
Linux (Arch)

Credits in:
Goldsmiths University of London: How dirty is Deptford’s air?
Citizen Sense: Bridgewater
Citizen Sense: Airsift Data Analysis

Interviews in:
isendyouthis artdiary
Little Song Films

Post-graduate MSc Digital Futures at Institute of Digital Art and Technology, University of Plymouth, United Kingdom. A minimalist designer and a full-stack web developer who has a thing for science, technology, art and philosophy. A wonderer searching for a theory of everything.

data.title: Origins
data.subtitle: Origins of Things
data.darkModeBgStyle: background: #E53E87; background: -webkit-radial-gradient(circle at top left, #E53E87, #0B06C1); background: -moz-radial-gradient(circle at top left, #E53E87, #0B06C1); background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #E53E87, #0B06C1);
data.contents: A collection of things — ideas, thoughts, quotes, books, posts, skills, and more, that I found, or made, and locked them in time — that have contributed to the things I create and could benefit you too.
data.excerpt: A collection of things — ideas, thoughts, quotes, books, posts, skills, and more, that I found, or made, and locked them in time — that have contributed to the things I create and could benefit you too.

slideItems.title: Ghost
slideItems.content: The teaching and effort of all, of all, Philosophies, Science, Technologies, Arts, And Poetry, Is to return us to our origins. But, we can't go back as we were, We only can become, Merely become... Ghosts.

slideItems.title: Wonderer
slideItems.content: All will pass: our achievements and failures, loves and hatred, religions and science, but this will remain: the wonderer looking into the distance, the mist rising over the horizon.

slideItems.title: Place
slideItems.content: ...and all these distances become the place I run to when the dark rises, when I want your ghost to come to warm my winter sky and watch my summer stars.
